example.name: agentive, no color
example.text: Officials from both nations say the U.S. public's skittishness about Japanese investment could color a second round of bilateral economic talks scheduled for next week in Washington.
example.arg: the U.S. public's skittishness about Japanese investment
a second round of bilateral economic talks scheduled for next week in Washington

example.name: agentive, with color
example.text: John colored all his Easter eggs jet black.

example.name: passive, with color
example.text: All of John's Easter eggs are colored jet black.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Folks will be lined up outside the polling places , just waiting *PRO*-2 to color in the dot next to ANY Democrat that goes up against these baboons !
example.arg: the dot next to ANY Democrat that goes up against these baboons
